titlestmt.titleproper: Institute of International Education records, Publications, RG 3
A Guide to the Institute of International Education records, Publications, RG 3 FA1564

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-07-24 00:06:54 -0400.

did.unittitle: Institute of International Education records, Publications, RG 3

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Institute of International Education (New York, N.Y.)

physdesc.extent: 52.54 cubic feet of paper records and 106 microfilm reels.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Record Group 3: Publications is arranged in two series - Series 1: Paper records; Series 2: Microforms.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains publications produced by the Institute of International Education (IIE), publications produced by IIE in partnership with others, as well as publications collected by IIE that were produced by other foundations, institutions and government agencies.
